title: If I want to toss a line in the water without a hook or bait, just a sinker at the end, am I still required to have a fishing license?
text:
Dave,



I would say no, you don't need a license for essentially dropping
anchor, but I also would defer to the state licensing requirements,
which you can find here:
http://www.ncwildlife.org/Portals/0/Regs/Documents/2011-12/2011-12_RegsDigest.pdf
